page.title: 09Typical Sundays
page.content:
On Sundays we have eggs and cups of tea for breakfast.Then I help Mum and Dad outside on the farm.I feed the cows then play with my sister,Claire, in the garden. After lunch we go to Sunday school. We sing and read from The Bible and then play outside until it is time to go home.We have to milk the cows before we play again.After tea l help Mum in the house.
On Sundays we go to Steam Rallies.We get up at half past six and load the lorry and tie the tractor on.When we arrive we unload.Dad sets up our Junk stall.The tractors are put on display in the morning and in the afternoon they are driven around to a commentary.We pack up at 6 o'clock and go home.
